item.title: Sanwa Supply Gravi
item.description: prevent finger maul by using a trackball. People who know me would tell you that I am a big fan of trackball as a replacement for using a mouse. Having tried a couple of different trackballs, the one I am currently using is the Sanwa Gravi, made by Elecom from Japan ðŸ‡¯ðŸ‡µ. It is one of the better ones I have tried thus far, espcially if you replace the stock bearing with a ceremic one.
